original_text: So the Pharisees sent their own disciples to Jesus. They also sent people who were friends of King Herod. They said to Jesus, ‘Teacher, we know that you only say true things. You teach us what God wants us to do. It does not matter to you what other people think. If someone is important, you do not change your answers to make them happy.
korean_text: 자기 제자들을 헤롯 당원들과 함께 예수께 보내어 말하되 선생님이여 우리가 아노니 당신은 참되시고 진리로 하나님의 도를 가르치시며 아무도 꺼리는 일이 없으시니 이는 사람을 외모로 보지 아니하심이니이다

sentences.original_text: So the Pharisees sent their own disciples
who were friends of King Herod
Teacher, we know that you only say true things
sentences.korean_translation: 선생님, 당신은 진실된 것만 말씀하신다는 것을 압니다

sentences.original_text: You teach us what God wants us to do
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 하나님이 우리가 하기를 원하시는 것을 가르쳐줍니다

sentences.original_text: It does not matter to you what other people think
sentences.korean_translation: 다른 사람들이 어떻게 생각하는지는 당신에게 중요하지 않습니다

sentences.original_text: you do not change your answers to make them happy
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 그들을 기쁘게 하기 위해 대답을 바꾸지 않습니다
